translation: Let no wise man unsettle the minds of ignorant people who are attached to action; he should engage them in all actions, himself fulfilling them with devotion.
commentary: 3.26 Not not? Buddhibhedam unsettlement in the mind? should produce? of the ignorant of the ignorant? karmasanginaam of the persons attached to actions? Joshayet should engage? all actions all actions? learned the wise? Yuktah balanced? Samacharan performing.Commentary An ignorant may say to himself? I shall do this action and they shall enjoy its fruit. A wise man should not unsettle his belief. On the contrary
